properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
STRAIT OF SICILY.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 36-24N 012-05E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409
FAX: 3906 5922 737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT .
